features: FIRST AID SPRAY: The technology used in Active Skin Repair is the same safe and gentle molecule used in hospitals and households worldwide. Replace your medicine cabinet with this wound care solution that can do it all

DOCTOR AND CLINICALLY RECOMMENDED: ACTIVE Skin Repair's Spray is natural and non-toxic and also non-sensitizing. Contains no steroids, no synthetic antibiotics, no alcohol and no harsh or stinging chemicals.
DAILY SOLUTION FOR SKIN CARE: ACTIVE Skin Repair works on cuts, rashes, sunburns, and other skin irritations. The power of an first aid kit in a 3oz spray bottle
TOUGH ON GERMS: ACTIVE Skin Repair's first aid spray is a medical grade skin solution. It acts quickly to provide relief and helps support the body's natural healing process
FSA AND HSA APPROVED: Use your Flexible Spending Account or Health Saving Account card to purchase. MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE: Love it or simply return for a full refund

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ACTIVE Skin Repair Spray: Natural Healing Wound Spray ACTIVE Skin Repair’s antibacterial wound spray is a medical grade solution for minor wound care and everyday skin damage. ACTIVE Skin Repair's Wound Spray is a doctor-recommended first aid spray featuring HOCl which is natural, non-toxic and supports the body's healing process. Natural, non-toxic, and non-sensitizing (aka no sting). Because of this, it is safe to use around the eyes, mouth, ears and sensitive areas, AND it won’t sting. More than just an antiseptic spray, ACTIVE Skin Repair healing spray works on: minor wounds, cuts, scrapes, sunburns, traditional burns, chafing, rashes, wounds, insect bites and other skin irritations. IMPORTANT: We're honored that you chose Active Skin Repair for your skin repair needs. Used and loved by customers worldwide, we're confident you will like it as much as they do. If for any reason you aren't fully satisfied, simply let us know and we'll make sure you are taken care of.

Doctor Recommended We produce the same medical grade molecule used in hospitals worldwide. ACTIVE Skin Repair is manufactured in an ISO certified clean room in California and each product lot is tested before release to ensure safety and efficacy. Natural & Non-Toxic We used natural ingredients to replicate the same molecule your white blood cell produces through a proprietary manufacturing process. ACTIVE Skin Repair does not use toxic chemicals, synthetic antibiotics or petroleum and is biodegradable. No Sting | No Hurt We harnessed the power of our body’s immune system to create a product that works on hundreds of different issues all in a simple to use formulation. ACTIVE Skin Repair helps support the body’s natural healing process on minor cuts, scrapes, rashes, chafing, burns and other forms of skin damage. Multi-functional ACTIVE Skin Repair can be used safely and continuously without any of the sting or damage to healthy cells that is typically associated with toxic medical products. ACTIVE Skin Repair can be used on the entire body including around the eyes, ears, mouth, and other sensitive areas.

Clinically Proven Regenerative Technology The power of ACTIVE Skin Repair’s regenerative technology lies in our active ingredient: hypochlorous (HOCl). HOCl is naturally produced by the white blood cells in our body as a way to support the bodies natural healing process. For the first time, this clinically proven regenerative technology allows you to externally treat everyday skin damage using the same molecule that your body uses internally.

Real Science For Real Athletes ACTIVE Skin Repair is produced by BLDG Active, an athlete-owned medical technology company focused on building a bridge between science and sport by bringing cutting-edge and clinically proven medical technologies to the sports we love. BLDG Active was built on a foundation of biotech entrepreneurship and a deep rooted love for outdoor sports.

Healthier Technology for a Healthier Future BLDG Active is a 1% For The Planet Company, meaning 1% of every sale goes back to non profit environmental organizations to help protect the playgrounds we all love. Now you can make a better choice for yourself, your skin and the planet. Next time, reach for the ACTIVE Skin Repair. Made In The USA | 1% For The Planet Member

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The stuff is amazing! I bake bread and can’t work that particular job when I have a cut. First, I sliced my thumb open with a pizza cutter and the day after that my knife slipped while cutting onions at home and I sliced my finger. I ordered the spray and am absolutely stunned at how fast my cuts are healing. I’m older, and don’t heal as quickly as I did when I was young, but with this spray, I’m healing even faster than I did as a kid! Absolutely fantastic. 10 out of 10 highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Addition to Skin Care Routine
reviews.reviewText: I have a very simple skin care routine - as recommended by my dermatologist. It’s usually just cerave face wash and moisturizer. I used to have a fancier routine but a lot of products just irritated my face or just didn’t do anything special. I added this Active Skin Repair after Charles Gross talked about it on his tik tok. I don’t usually listen to influencers but his skin is so nice! I use Active Skin repair sometimes daily and sometimes only a couple times a week. It has never made my eczema flare up or caused irritation. I have a really smooth and soft face!The reason I am giving 5 stars is from when I got to witness the true magic of this product on my husband. He sometimes anxiously scratches his face to the point of having these bright red patches on his pale skin. Mid day, I convinced him to use my face wash, the Active Skin Repair, and my moisturizer and by the end of the day, the red patches were nearly gone. There was just a hint of pink. I was shocked to see how much it went down and so quickly too! I figured he’d need a regiment to get improvement. He seriously just used it once and the patches have just stayed gone. I wish I took a before and after but I didn’t expect it to work so quickly!This stuff is better than any fancy toner or oil or gel I’ve ever bought for my face. Now I put it on everything lol. There’s no like super pretty smell but honestly I don’t even think extra fragrance is good for the skin. I’m a huge fan of Active Skin Repair and it’s a staple in my skin care. I’m hesitant to write this because I don’t want to increase demand!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this stuff so much. I can’t believe how amazing it has made my skin. I was having some stubborn breakouts and this completely stopped them. Sometimes it even gets rid of them overnight. Just spray it on your face in the morning and at night and it works so good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Incredible & quick healing
reviews.reviewText: 6 days of use. Applied every 3 to 4 hours during the day. Amazing results. Love this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought with skepticism on if it actually works but it is so helpful! Sprayed on cuts and on scaring and it helps start to clear them up! Will for sure but again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Got rid of diaper rash
reviews.reviewText: A bit pricey but i love the fact that it has clean ingredients and it can be used for multiple purposes.It helped us get rid of diaper rash in 2 days!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One hundred percent works!!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this after seeing a few bloggers use it and thought why not give it a try. I struggle with cracking cuticles and peeling skin around them. It can get quite painful and is not ideal to have antibiotic cream on them are always wear band aids.With Active Skin Repair, I spray my fingers and cuticles a couple of times a day and by the time I am moving on to my next task, it is dry and soaked in. This helped heal up the cracking in record time and now keeps it from even starting. I will always keep this on hand for cuts and gashes. I have no doubt that a product like this would have helped my kids immensely when they were younger.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not sure if it works
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use and doesn't sting. However, is it making a difference at all, doesn't seem like it. So far I have used it on a rash, cat scratch, cut and infected finger nail. I don't plan to buy it again, especially for the price.
